ygData.subject: Re: Level 9 - Leather Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Part of my problem obviously is my dismal state of armor.  I have next to none..  Where do I get it and for how much?  Part of my problem is lack of funds.
ygData.messageBody:
Part of my problem obviously is my dismal state of armor. I have next to
none.. Where do I get it and for how much? Part of my problem is lack of
funds. I've never been able to get more than a plat or two more than the
cost of my next song. I've also been buying every song when I level - I've
since read that is not always the best way to go..

Thanks Again!

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Greg <sylvan1@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 11:42 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Level 9


> From: "Greg" <sylvan1@...>
>
> Welp, all of the replies are true but I think you are not fully utilizing
> the bard. The bard my be the second best soloing class there is. Im 20th
> level now and still soloing. You may be playing the bard like a fighter
that
> occasional sings a song. Wrong. At 9th level go to Ro. Make sure you got a
> full suit of leather. Armor is everything in this game. Get out your handy
